content: these fingerless gloves or handwarmers knit up in one day and only take one skein of yarn they re a great blank canvas for displaying fun images which can be added in duplicate stitch 3/11/11 - updated pdf to correct error in row 24 and thumb instructions should be 7 instead of 8 and 14 instead of 16 star wars charts here 1 katamari chart here 2 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/fairisle-patterns-from-the-movie-star-wars 2 http //bacoknitter wordpress com/2011/03/13/katamari-damacy-prince-chart/
